title: Getting an S on a Jungler
body:
Right, this has been bothering me a lot. Even though, I do well as Talon Jungle, we lose game because of a throw or afk. But, all and all, I try my best to get an S, be it farming, ganking a lot or just warding whenever I can. Looking at my match history, I see my KDA, warding and kill participation fine, but my CS is bad. I guess I have the mentality of stopping farm if I get fed. The main question being, how much CS must I have at the 20 min interval, the 30 minute interval and the 40 minute interval?

Answer would be much appreciated!

replies.body: tax lane, kill adc to get a good kda, tiamat is needed as jg talon rush before anything else.
Its not needed as a rush, its like taking tiamat on hybrid shaco, its a good snowball item rush for him but its not needed
try and tax lane minions and the enemy jungle if your ahead.
